requirement_designation: Science, Nature, & Technology Lab with Writing
course_description: This course introduces sophisticated laboratory instruments and experimental techniques. Experiments include nuclear magnetic resonance, atomic force microscopy, and quantum entanglement.
prerequisites: PHYS 253 or PHYS_OX 253 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
schedule_location: TTh 2:30pm-5:15pm in Math & Science Center - N309
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 4048, Section #: 3, Type: LAB, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 2:30-5:15p, Instructor: J. Brody, Status: Closed
